siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Create tailored B2B sales emails with a click. Magic Sales Bot uses GPT-3 to create high-converting emails to send to your prospects, allowing you to prospect 10x faster.
blogPost.body: Create tailored B2B sales emails with a click. Magic Sales Bot uses GPT-3 to create high-converting emails to send to your prospects, allowing you to prospect 10x faster.
blogPost.title: Magic Sales Bot - Write sales emails 10x faster with GPT-3
blogPost.author: Ryan Doyle

localize.description: 一键创建定制的B2B销售邮件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3创建高转化率的电子邮件发送给您的潜在客户，让您的潜在客户速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，销售邮件的撰写速度提高了10倍。

localize.description: 一鍵創建定製的B2B銷售郵件。Magic Sales Bot使用GPT-3創建高轉化率的電子郵件發送給您的潛在客戶，讓您的潛在客戶速度提高10倍。
localize.tagline: 使用GPT-3，銷售郵件的撰寫速度提高了10倍。

previous.excerpt: Buffer’s https://buffer.com/engage helps small businesses stay on top of their Instagram comments and build a loyal and engaged audience. It automatically detects important interactions that need attention, and makes it quick and easy to reply or dismiss comments.
previous.title: Engagement by Buffer - A faster way to engage with your Instagram audience.

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，帮助小企业保持对Instagram评论的关注，并建立忠诚和参与的受众。它能自动检测出需要关注的重要互动，并使回复或驳回评论变得快速而简单。
localize.tagline: 与你的Instagram受众互动的更快方式。

localize.description: Buffer的https://buffer.com/engage，幫助小企業保持對Instagram評論的關注，並建立忠誠和參與的受衆。它能自動檢測出需要關注的重要互動，並使回覆或駁回評論變得快速而簡單。
localize.tagline: 與你的Instagram受衆互動的更快方式。

next.excerpt: SaaSync retrieves invoices and other data from QBO or Xero. This data is transformed ready for use with ChartMogul. Data that can't be automatically synced appears in a review screen where SaaSync users can edit it before pushing remaining data to ChartMogul.
next.title: SaaSync - Integrate QuickBooks Online and Xero with ChartMogul

localize.description: SaaSync从QBO或Xero检索发票和其他数据。这些数据经过转换后可用于ChartMogul。不能自动同步的数据会出现在审查屏幕上，SaaSync用户可以在将剩余数据推送到ChartMogul之前对其进行编辑。
SaaSync從QBO或Xero檢索發票和其他數據。這些數據經過轉換後可用於ChartMogul。不能自動同步的數據會出現在審查屏幕上，SaaSync用戶可以在將剩餘數據推送到ChartMogul之前對其進行編輯。
